font-size.name: Font Size
font-size.hint: Default size of the damage font

max-font-scale.name: Maximum Font Scale
max-font-scale.hint: Maximum Size to scale the damage font to

top-offset.name: % offset from top of token
top-offset.hint: Offset percentage from top of token for the damage, input as whole number (IE. 70 is 70%)

jitter.name: Jitter
jitter.hint: How much the damage text will move around its spawn point (0 = doesn't move, 1 is it could spawn on the edges of the token)

number-scale-type.name: Number Scale Type
number-scale-type.hint: Scaling type for the size of the damage RPG Numbers

damage-split.name: Damage Split
damage-split.hint: How to split damage numbers from roll (None: total only, By Type: By damage type, All: Splits all terms)

debug-mode.name: Debug Mode
debug-mode.hint: Have the console receive messages for different stuff

duration.name: Text Duration
duration.hint: How long until  the damage text despawns in seconds

wait-time-between-numbers.name: Wait Time between numbers (ms)
wait-time-between-numbers.hint: How long in between each damage number should the game wait before spawning the next, in milliseconds.

show-only-GM.name: Show numbers only for GM
show-only-GM.hint: Show  the damage numbers only for the game if you like them, but not that much

animation-scale.name: Animation Scale
animation-scale.hint: How far out from the token should  the damage numbers move

show-total.name: Show Total
show-total.hint: Show total as a number in the center of the token in addition to other damage numbers

check-enabled.name: Enable Checks
check-enabled.hint: Show number pop ups when attempting checks

check-duration.name: Check Duration
check-duration.hint: Time for check number pop up to show
